### Classes

## Classes

### <a name="snap"></a>`snap`

The snap class.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `snap` class:

* [`package_ensure`](#package_ensure)
* [`service_ensure`](#service_ensure)
* [`service_enable`](#service_enable)
* [`core_snap_ensure`](#core_snap_ensure)

##### <a name="package_ensure"></a>`package_ensure`

Data type: `String[1]`

The state of the snapd package.

Default value: `'installed'`

##### <a name="service_ensure"></a>`service_ensure`

Data type: `Stdlib::Ensure::Service`

The state of the snapd service.

Default value: `'running'`

##### <a name="service_enable"></a>`service_enable`

Data type: `Boolean`

Run the system service on boot.

Default value: ``true``

##### <a name="core_snap_ensure"></a>`core_snap_ensure`

Data type: `String[1]`

The state of the snap `core`.

Default value: `'installed'`
